column2: my husband and I wanted to check this place out simply because Ferris Bueller and his friends had such a good time here.  So
column3: off we went in search of school children on a field trip so we could crash the trip and join their chain of hand holding.  Only now
column4: we discovered thst chain hand holding is not the preferred method of keeping groups of children together.  Instead you get in a single file line
column5: stretch your arms straight out in front of you like Frankenstein and place your hands on the shoulders of the person ahead of you.  This is more effective
column6: but it's somewhat awkward when there are significant height differences
column7: and so my hubby and I broke off on our own as one of the room moms laughed when we ran past the group in our own Frankenstein march.
